results.name: Primes in A088580.
comment: These primes are neither sorted nor uniqued. They are listed in the order found in A088580.
link: Robert Price, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..2967
OEIS Wiki, Cyclotomic Polynomials at x=n, n! and sigma(n)
maple: with(numtheory): A258430:=n->`if`(isprime(1+sigma(n)), 1+sigma(n), NULL): seq(A258430(n), n=1..300); # _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Jul 09 2015
program: (MAGMA) [a: n in [1..300] | IsPrime(a) where a is 1 + SumOfDivisors(n)]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, May 30 2015
results.author: _Robert Price_, May 29 2015
